name: RUGBY 18 (itch)
description:
THE NEW RUGBY REFERENCE Experience the tension of the greatest matches in RUGBY 18. Take control of the best players in the world, faithfully recreated alongside the greatest oﬀicial championships. With RUGBY 18’s innovative and intuitive gameplay, various game modes and the ability to build your own fantasy team, rugby fans are in for hours and hours of competition.

KEY FEATURES

• RBS 6 NATIONS, AVIVA PREMIERSHIP RUGBY, PRO 12, TOP 14, ALL BLACKS… all the best teams of the 2017-2018 season. 

• AS IMMERSIVE AS THE GREATEST SPORTS GAMES : faithfully recreated players, real-time field damage, dynamic replays, authentic stadium atmosphere… 

• INTUITIVE CONTROLS translating all the technical rugby moves and step-by-step hints helping you discover the game. 

• HOURS AND HOURS OF COMPETITION : Oﬀline or online Quick Match, Career, Tournament, Season, Weekly Match and Team Creation…
